onResume().Description: Called when the fragment is visible to the user and actively running. This is generally tied to @B_android#app#Activity#onResume_E@ of the containing Activity's lifecycle.

Parameters: Fragment: Fragment instance to be added.
startImmersiveFragment(android.app.Fragm.Description: Displays a fragment to the user, temporarily replacing the contents of this fragment.

Parameters: Fragment: Fragment instance to be added.
startPreferenceFragment(android.app.Frag.Description: Displays a preference fragment to the user. This method can also be used to display list-style fragments on top of the stack of preference fragments.

onPreferenceStartInitialScreen().Description: Called to instantiate the initial @B_android#support#v14#preference#PreferenceFragment_E@ to be shown in this fragment. Implementations are expected to call @B_android#support#v17#preference#LeanbackSettingsFragment#startPreferenceFragment_E@.

onPause().Description: Called when the Fragment is no longer resumed. This is generally tied to @B_android#app#Activity#onPause_E@ of the containing Activity's lifecycle.
